description: Meet with Imperial officer to hand over kyber crystal on the moon of Ryloth's moon, Twi'lek-4. Crystal is currently in transit.
Oversee kyber crystal handover on the moon of Orto Plutonia. Location is subject to change due to Rebel activity.
Verify kyber crystal transfer on the ice moon of Ilum's satellite, Ilum-2. Check for any signs of tampering.
Review kyber crystal handover protocols on the space station orbiting moon of Nal Hutta's moon, Nar Shaddaa-6. Station is currently in geosynchronous orbit.
Inspect kyber crystal storage facility on the moon of Sullust's satellite, Sullust-3. Facility is located in a remote crater.
Conduct a routine inspection of kyber crystal storage on the moon of Duro's moon, Duro-2. Check for any signs of Rebel sabotage.
Meet with Imperial officer to discuss kyber crystal handover on the moon of Teth's moon, Teth-4. Officer is currently en route.
Oversee kyber crystal transfer on the moon of Christophsis's moon, Christophsis-2. Location is heavily fortified.
Verify kyber crystal storage on the ice moon of Felucia's satellite, Felucia-3. Check for any signs of tampering.
Review kyber crystal handover protocols on the space station orbiting moon of Geonosis's moon, Geonosis-4. Station is currently in high orbit.
Inspect kyber crystal storage facility on the moon of Kamino's satellite, Kamino-2. Facility is located in a secure underwater bunker.
Conduct a routine inspection of kyber crystal storage on the moon of Saleucami's moon, Saleucami-3. Check for any signs of Rebel activity.
Meet with Imperial officer to discuss kyber crystal handover on the moon of Mygeeto's moon, Mygeeto-2. Officer is currently on moon.
Oversee kyber crystal transfer on the moon of Utapau's moon, Utapau-4. Location is heavily guarded.
Verify kyber crystal storage on the ice moon of Polis Massa's satellite, Polis Massa-2. Check for any signs of tampering.
Review kyber crystal handover protocols on the space station orbiting moon of Korriban's moon, Korriban-3. Station is currently in low orbit.
Inspect kyber crystal storage facility on the moon of Mustafar's satellite, Mustafar-2. Facility is located in a secure fortress.
Conduct a routine inspection of kyber crystal storage on the moon of Kashyyyk's moon, Kashyyyk-4. Check for any signs of Wookiee activity.
Meet with Imperial officer to discuss kyber crystal handover on the moon of Rodia's moon, Rodia-3. Officer is currently en route.
Oversee kyber crystal transfer on the moon of Nal Hutta's moon, Nal Hutta-2. Location is heavily fortified.
Verify kyber crystal storage on the ice moon of Hoth's satellite, Hoth-3. Check for any signs of Rebel sabotage.
Review kyber crystal handover protocols on the space station orbiting moon of Bespin's moon, Bespin-4. Station is currently in high orbit.
Inspect kyber crystal storage facility on the moon of Endor's satellite, Endor-2. Facility is located in a secure shield bunker.
Conduct a routine inspection of kyber crystal storage on the moon of Dagobah's moon, Dagobah-3. Check for any signs of Jedi activity.
